data.message: hi there! there's an annual gathering here in Manila that aims to promote hiphop in the phils and the world. it happens at Araneta Coliseum. it's a series of events including rap battles, dance concert, skate competition, basketball, biking events etc. having you on the show would not only fill the entire venue but would solidify the hiphop scene in our country. it would mean so much to us if you could come. april 9, 2015 @ Araneta
